trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.AppDomain.AssemblyLoad" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o evento de <see cref="E:System.AppDomain.AssemblyLoad" /> .

trans-unit.source: An instance that represents the currently loaded assembly.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância que representa o assembly carregado no momento.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.AssemblyLoadEventArgs" /> class using the specified <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.AssemblyLoadEventArgs" /> usando o <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: when invoked late-bound through mechanisms such as <see cref="M:System.Type.InvokeMember(System.String,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Object,System.Object[],System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[],System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.String[])" />.
trans-unit.target: quando invocado com associação tardia por meio de mecanismos como <see cref="M:System.Type.InvokeMember(System.String,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Object,System.Object[],System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[],System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.String[])" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" /> that represents the currently loaded assembly.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" /> que representa o assembly carregado no momento.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" /> that represents the currently loaded assembly.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" /> que representa o assembly carregado no momento.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is set by the common language runtime when the <xref:System.AppDomain.AssemblyLoad?displayProperty=nameWithType> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: O valor dessa propriedade é definido pelo common language runtime quando o <xref:System.AppDomain.AssemblyLoad?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento ocorre.
